quote_last: in the morning when Pastor Grant finally got back to the parsonage.
title: Warrior Monk
author: Ray Keating

quote_first: I think my credit card was in there too. I wrote down the words credit card and said that if they wouldn’t let me cancel them I’d demand that they registered the loss so you couldn’t be charge for anything beyond the time of my calling them up. I looked at the clock. It was
title: The Whole Story and Other Stories
author: Ali Smith
